data.description: XS interface for GCTP map projection library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The main category is Cartography, within that topic, the function
    that is performed is map projections. This module uses the GCTP map
    projection library, so it is called Cartography::Projection::GCTP. I
    asked about the name on the PAUSE mailing list and they seemed to
    think it was fine.
